pullrequest.title: Adapt sdformat to debian packaging policy

content.raw:
Sorry I don't see any easy fix on this one.
However I would set the CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR explicitly in the dh_auto_configure step to avoid moving around libraries during the install step.
The real advantage is that you will get the right path into the process and avoid moving aroud things and breaking things if at some point you embed your LIBDIR path into your binary.
